com.matrixone.apps.domain
Interface Job.BackgroundJob

Enclosing class:
Job
public static interface Job.BackgroundJob

Any program that wants to be invoked in the background should implement this interface. Doing so gives it access to an associated Job object, which is set automatically just before the job actually runs. Interfaces require that all members be public, so we either go with an interface that has a public Job member, or an interface that exposes getters and setters and forces the implementer to declare their own Job data member. The latter was selected; rejected alternatives also shown below.

 void setJob(Job job)
